title: Calories in 1 Teaspoon Sugar
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 teaspoon sugar, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Granulated white sugar, level teaspoon (approximately 4 g), no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type, granularity, and measurement accuracy; check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of granulated sugar contains about 16 kcal, all from carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 teaspoon sugar?
faqs.a: Approximately 16 kcal per level teaspoon of granulated sugar.
Yes, nearly 100% carbohydrates, with 4 g total carbs and sugars per teaspoon.

faqs.q: Does sugar have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No, pure sugar has 0 g protein and 0 g fat.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in one teaspoon?
faqs.a: About 4 grams of sugar, equivalent to 16 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories between white and brown sugar?
faqs.a: Minimal difference; both are around 16 kcal per teaspoon, though brown has trace molasses.
